extracted_text:
With the exception of the Brevard Street area (see Section
9.906(2)(d)(2)(c)) and other permitted structures identified in Section 12.108,
there is no maximum height, however, no structure, fixture or other objects over
60 feet in height on a lot abutting residentially zoned land which has residential
structure of 40 feet or less in height may be situated SO that it casts a shadow at a
distance greater than 20 feet across any property line on either time of solstice
between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.
llm_outputs.rationale: The text explicitly states that there is no maximum height for the UMUD, with some exceptions for specific areas and situations. However, it does not provide a single definitive maximum height value for the district overall.
